snippet: Norman and Irma Braman plan to single-handedly fund the design and construction of South Florida’s newest major museum, the Institute of Contemporary Art, Miami.
abstract: Auto dealership magnate Norman Braman and wife Irma plan to fund design and construction of Institute of Contemporary Art, Miami, South Florida's newest major museum; opening is timed for Art Basel Miami Beach in December 2016, and is poised to be a cultural game changer in city already crowded with four significant private museums.
lead_paragraph: Norman and Irma Braman plan to single-handedly fund the design and construction of South Florida’s newest major museum, the Institute of Contemporary Art, Miami.

headline.seo: In Miami, the Bramans Plan the Institute of Contemporary Art
headline.main: Envisioning a Museum, the Sky’s the Limit
headline.print_headline: Envisioning a Museum, the Sky’s the Limit
